data.BD: Before Discount - Full amount for the service prior to application of any appropriate discounts
data.BW: Biweekly Price per Unit - Price charged every two weeks
data.CR: Carnet - An official certificate, especially any type of the various customs documents required to allow people or goods to cross certain national boundaries
data.EC: Estimated Credit - Indicates the estimated credit value to be provided
data.FX: Fixed Price - Buyer and seller agree on a final price; invoice cut for this price; credit for provisional price
data.ME: Midterm Endorsement Price per Unit - A change in coverage that occurs between policy renewals that results in a policy premium change
data.NT: Net - Indicates a net unit price
data.PB: Annual Price Per Unit - Price changed Once per Year
data.PU: Quarterly Price per Unit - Price for a quarterly installment of a billed item
data.PV: Provisional Price - Sold on or off the futures market; price not really fixed; product sold at this price
data.SA: Semi Annual Price per Unit - Price charged twice per year
data.SM: Semi Monthly Price per Unit - Price charged twice per month
data.ST: Standard - Indicates a standard unit price, including all surcharges
data.VQ: Verbal Quote - Provided by salesman, and nothing is on paper or in electronic file to back up the price
data.WI: Weekly Price per Unit - Price charged once per week
